title: Sam Altman’s sprint to correct OpenAI’s direction and fend off Google
description: The CEO is prioritizing achieving mass popularity through ChatGPT versus moonshot projects like artificial general intelligence
content:
The world’s most valuable startup should pause its side projects like its Sora video generator for eight weeks and focus on improving ChatGPT, its popular chatbot that kicked off the AI boom.

title: Trump to allow Nvidia to sell H200 AI chips to China
description: President Donald Trump announced Monday he will allow Nvidia to sell some Artificial Intelligence chips to China, if the United States gets a 25% cut.
content: Dec. 8 (UPI) -- President Donald Trump announced Monday that he will allow tech giant Nvidia to sell some Artificial Intelligence chips to China, with a 25% cut for the United States, as he reversed his stance on a previous sticking point in both cou... [2491 chars]

title: Google says first AI glasses with Gemini will arrive in 2026
description: Alphabet Inc's Google said it's working to create two different categories of artificial intelligence-powered smart glasses to compete next year with existing models from Meta Platforms Inc: one with screens, and another that's audio focused.
content:
Alphabet Inc’s Google said it’s working to create two different categories of artificial intelligence-powered smart glasses to compete next year with existing models from Meta Platforms Inc: one with screens, and another that’s audio focused.

title: Nvidia Wins Trump’s Approval To Sell H200 AI Chips In China
description: President Donald Trump granted Nvidia Corp. permission to ship its H200 artificial intelligence chip to China in exchange for a 25% surcharge, a move that lets the world’s most valuable company potentially regain billions of dollars in lost business from a key global market.
content: President Donald Trump granted Nvidia Corp. permission to ship its H200 artificial intelligence chip to China in exchange for a 25% surcharge, a move that lets the world’s most valuable company potentially regain billions of dollars in lost business ... [8170 chars]

title: Trump to issue executive order for 'One Rulebook' on AI across US
description: US President Donald Trump has announced that his administration will introduce a unified rulebook for artificial intelligence (AI) regulation across the United States.
content:
Washington, DC [US], December 9 (ANI): US President Donald Trump has announced that his administration will introduce a unified rulebook for artificial intelligence (AI) regulation across the United States.

title: Feds say Houston-linked ‘Operation Gatekeeper’ broke $160M A.I. chip smuggling pipeline to China
description: Federal prosecutors with the Southern District of Texas say a sophisticated smuggling network with ties to the Houston area illegally funneled some of the world’s most advanced artificial intelligence computer chips toward China and other restricted destinations, moving at least $160 million in hardware and taking in more than $50 million in overseas payments.

title: In "Marjorie Prime" on Broadway, the robot future is here
description: June Squibb, the oldest actress ever to open a Broadway show, stars as a grieving widow with dementia in a play about artificial intelligence.
content: NEW YORK — The central premise of “Marjorie Prime,” now on Broadway with Cynthia Nixon, June Squibb, Danny Burstein and Christopher Lowell, is that technology might allow the creation of bespoke robots allowing, say, a grieving widow with dementia to... [4182 chars]

title: ‘Marjorie Prime’ Review: A.I. Gave Her Back Her Husband. Was It Worth It?
description: June Squibb stars in the Broadway premiere of Jordan Harrison’s meditation on grief and the nature of human and artificial intelligence.

title: Trump Says He’ll Sign Executive Order Curbing State AI Rules
description: President Donald Trump said he would approve an executive order this week establishing “ONE RULE” on artificial intelligence aimed at limiting state-level policies regulating the technology.
